dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information to provide and improve our services. This includes:

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing
dataSharing.content: We may share limited data with:
dataSharing.ai: AI service providers for ingredient recognition
dataSharing.usda: USDA FoodData Central for ingredient validation
dataSharing.noSale: We never sell your personal information

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your data, including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use minimal tracking for analytics and app functionality. You can manage preferences in your device settings.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or requests, contact us at:

disclaimer.title: Important Notice
disclaimer.content: This app provides recipe suggestions based on ingredient recognition. Always verify ingredient safety and check for allergens before cooking.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using FridgeWise AI, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part, please do not use our app.

description.title: Service Description
description.content: FridgeWise AI is a mobile application that provides:

userAccount.title: User Accounts
userAccount.content: When creating an account, you agree to:
userAccount.security: Maintain the security of your login credentials
userAccount.responsibility: Take responsibility for all activities under your account

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content: You agree to use the app only for:
usage.noMisuse: Lawful activities and not to misuse our services
usage.noViolation: Activities that don't violate others' rights
usage.noReverse: Not attempting to reverse engineer our technology

content.title: Content and Intellectual Property
content.content: All app content, including recipes, interface design, and AI technology, is owned by FridgeWise AI and protected by intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FridgeWise AI is provided 'as is'. We are not liable for any damages arising from app use. Users are responsible for verifying recipe safety and ingredient compatibility.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may terminate accounts that violate these terms. You may delete your account at any time through the app settings.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms periodically. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance of new terms.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at:

medicalDisclaimer.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Medical Disclaimer
medicalDisclaimer.content: This app is not a substitute for professional medical advice. Consult healthcare providers for dietary restrictions related to medical conditions. We are not responsible for adverse health effects from recipe suggestions.

allergyDisclaimer.title: üö® Allergy Warning
allergyDisclaimer.content: Always verify ingredients for allergens. Our AI recognition may not detect all allergens. Check all ingredients carefully if you have food allergies or intolerances.

chatAI.intro: Edit the recipe using AI chat. You can ask to change ingredients, servings, cuisine style, etc.
chatAI.modificationsApplied: Modifications have been successfully applied to your recipe!

support.title: Help & Support
support.contactDescription: Need help? We're here to assist you! Send us an email and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
support.quickTopicsDescription: Select a common topic or write your own:

support.emailError: Error opening email client. Please send an email manually to: {{email}}

welcome.title: Never waste food again
welcome.subtitle: Turn what you have into what you love
welcome.description: FridgeWise helps you cook delicious meals with ingredients you already have at home.

scan.title: Snap a photo, get recipes

ai.title: Smart suggestions that work
ai.subtitle: Recipes based on what you actually have
ai.description: Get personalized recipes that match your ingredients, time, and cooking skills.
